person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: A police spokesman said two youths believed to be supporters of President Nelson Mandela 's African National Congress ( ANC ) had been killed when unknown gunmen opened fire at the rural settlement of Izingolweni on KwaZulu-Natal province 's south coast on Thursday night .

Let's think step by step.

| Person |
| --- |
| police spokesman |
| President Nelson Mandela |
| two youths |
| supporters of President Nelson Mandela's African National Congress ( ANC ) |
| unknown gunmen |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Person" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person |
| --- |
| police spokesman |
| two youths |
| supporters of President Nelson Mandela's African National Congress ( ANC ) |

(Note: "unknown gunmen" does not clearly refer to a specific person and is not included in the table.)

organization.content:
Please identify the "Organization" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Organization". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: A police spokesman said two youths believed to be supporters of President Nelson Mandela 's African National Congress ( ANC ) had been killed when unknown gunmen opened fire at the rural settlement of Izingolweni on KwaZulu-Natal province 's south coast on Thursday night .

Let's think step by step.

| Organization |
| --- |
| African National Congress (ANC) |
| Police |
| President Nelson Mandela's African National Congress (ANC) |

Explanation:
The paragraph mentions two organizations: the African National Congress (ANC), which is identified as the political party that the two youths are believed to support, and the police, who are the spokesman for the organization. The paragraph also mentions President Nelson Mandela in relation to the ANC, so I included "President Nelson Mandela's African National Congress (ANC)" as a separate organization to reflect the specific context in which the ANC is mentioned in the paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Organization" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Organization".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Organization |
| --- |
| African National Congress (ANC) |

Explanation:
In the revised version of the paragraph, I removed "police spokesman" as it refers to a role rather than an organization. The paragraph mentions only one clear organization, which is the African National Congress (ANC).
